tool_description: Calculate the price of your OpenAI API call. Counts tokens and returns the price for the given model.
name: OpenAI GPT Pricing Calculator
title: OpenAI GPT Pricing Calculator

api_list.name: Embedding
api_list.description: Calculates the usage price of the embedding models.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://openai-gpt-pricing-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/embedding"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openai-gpt-pricing-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
